abstract: An object your app uses to play music.
rawMarkdown:

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/MusicKit/MusicPlayer
crawled: 2025-12-01T09:50:43Z

# MusicPlayer

**Class**

An object your app uses to play music.

## Declaration

```swift
class MusicPlayer
```

## Classes

- **MusicPlayer.Queue**: A representation of the playback queue for a music player.
- **MusicPlayer.State**: An object that exposes the observable properties of a music player.

## Instance Properties

- **isPreparedToPlay**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a music player is ready to play.
- **playbackTime**: The current playback time, in seconds, of the current entry.
- **state**: An object that exposes the observable properties of the music player.

## Instance Methods

- **beginSeekingBackward()**: Begins seeking backward through the music content.
- **beginSeekingForward()**: Begins seeking forward through the music content.
- **endSeeking()**: Ends forward and backward seeking through the music content.
- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the current entry.
- **play()**: Initiates playback from the current queue.
- **prepareToPlay()**: Prepares the current queue for playback, interrupting any active (nonmixable) audio sessions.
- **restartCurrentEntry()**: Restarts playback at the beginning of the currently playing entry.
- **skipToNextEntry()**: Starts playback of the next entry in the playback queue.
- **skipToPreviousEntry()**: Starts playback of the previous entry in the playback queue.
- **stop()**: Ends playback of the current entry.

## Enumerations

- **MusicPlayer.PlaybackStatus**: The music player playback status modes.
- **MusicPlayer.RepeatMode**: The repeat modes for the music player.
- **MusicPlayer.ShuffleMode**: The shuffle modes for the music player.
- **MusicPlayer.Transition**: The transition applied between playing items.

## Playback

- **ApplicationMusicPlayer**: An object your app uses to play music in a way that doesn’t affect the Music app’s state.
- **SystemMusicPlayer**: An object your app uses to play music by controlling the Music app’s state.
- **PlayableMusicItem**: A set of properties that a music player uses to initiate playback for a music item.
- **PlayParameters**: An opaque object that represents parameters to initiate playback of a playable music item using a music player.

## Inherited By

- ApplicationMusicPlayer
- SystemMusicPlayer
